content.detailedDescription: Each year las vegas puts on a fantastic fireworks display along the las vegas strip.  each casino/hotel sets off their own display so i decided to drive west of town to get a panoramic view of all the displays on my camera.  photo was snapped with a sharp digital camcorder model vl-z5 set at infinity.  the craft appeared without notice.  i snapped this photo and lost track of time.  i seriously do not recall any other details.  this is the most detailed photo of a ufo i have ever seen.  i would refer to this craft as dome shaped.  because it contains almost every color of the rainbow,  i call this craft the "rainbow transport".  this is very hard for me to admit, but i feel that i experienced the sensation of "missing time" and do not recall any additional details.  the craft appeared above me about 200 ft. high and 100 yards away.  i do not recall the craft leaving my sight.
content.summary: Object appeared unexpectedly while i intended to photograph las vegas' fireworks display.

content.detailedDescription: Each year las vegas puts on a fantastic fireworks display along the las vegas strip.  each casino/hotel sets off their own display so i decided to drive west of town to get a panoramic view of all the displays on my camera.  photo was snapped with a sharp digital camcorder model vl-z5 set at infinity.  the craft appeared without notice.  i snapped this photo and lost track of time.  i seriously do not recall any other details.  this is the most detailed photo of a ufo i have ever seen.  i would refer to this craft as dome shaped.  because it contains almost every color of the rainbow,  i call this craft the "rainbow transport".  this is very hard for me to admit, but i feel that i experienced the sensation of "missing time" and do not recall any additional details.  the craft appeared above me about 200 ft. high and 100 yards away.  i do not recall the craft leaving my sight.
content.summary: Object appeared unexpectedly while i intended to photograph las vegas' fireworks display.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed two objects at extreme altitude (low earth orbit?), traveling west to east over approximately 30 degrees of arc at an elevation of approximately 85 degrees to the south.

objects were first noticed when looking up at a jet aircraft, which likely had taken off from orlando international, as it was executing a 180 degree change of direction from due north at an estimated altitude of 15k to 20k feet.  objects were much, much higher and seemed to be moving at a greater velocity than the aircraft.

upon noticing the first (trailing) object, we thought it could be the space station or other low earth orbit satellite but then we noticed the second object leading the first and moving away from it.  

both objects pulsated with an extremely bright light at intervals of 3-5 seconds.  lead object was some 3-5 degrees of arc leading the trailing object and pulling away slightly  (lower orbit?).

the shape of both objects were indiscriminate, although we (my spouse and i) thought we could discern a cylinrical shape slightly longer than wide but we cannot be certain as the objectly were very, very high and slightly to the west of the sun.  even then, the pulsating lights were as bright or brighter than the sun to the east.

needless to say, after observing the objects we felt they were not the space station or other low earth orbit satellite.

we eventually lost sight of the objects as they continued to the east beyond the range of our vision.
content.summary: Two objects emitting a brilliant pulsating  light, extremely high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette in eureka, ca, a little after 9pm, when an unusual light in the sky to the south of me caught my attention. it was much brighter and larger than any airplane light i've ever seen. i didn't know what it was and didn't take my eyes off of it.
it was like a fireball / a glowing orange sphere / a bright orange light / similar to an orange street light. it moved steadily in a northern direction about 20 degrees above horizon, slowed down to a stop almost overhead at around 70 to 80 degrees up and still at a far distance, then moved south until i could no longer see it. as it went south the light began flickering between bright, dim, and dark, although i'm not entirely sure that there wasn't some obstructions blocking my view at that time, thereby causing the flickering effect.
while observing this object, i walked about 38 yards towards the east and about 30 yards to the south, changing my point of view, and it seemed to be above 5,000 to 10,000 feet in altitude and it's possible that it was beyond earth's atmosphere.
it's size can only be approximated because i only saw 'light', no 'object'. so the 'light' was about the size of one/fifth of the moon, easily the third biggest object i've seen in the sky - 1)sun 2)moon 3)this thing. maybe 5 or 10 jet-planes could fit inside the diameter.
it was not: standard satellite; planet; natural space object (meteor, shooting star, planet, etc); rocket; balloon; normal!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing orange sphere traveled south to north, then headed south again

content.detailedDescription: While photographing the us navy blue angels flying overhead i captured an unusual object that i did not see when taking the photograph. it was only when i downloaded the picture on to my computer that i noticed the object.
content.summary: A sighting captured while photographing the us navy blue angels flying overhead

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture this morning when the sky was completely overcast. i took three more but the (maybe not the same) object was partially obscured by clouds. in this one the object was outside the cloud bank. i was in my front yard.
content.summary: Fairly clear picture of object in cloudy sky

content.detailedDescription:
On or about thanksgiving 2004, i was on my deck. i saw what appeared to be a lightning bolt come out of the ground, then a huge ball of electricity then scattered particles of electric. it was split second so i can���t be sure if the ball was first then the big bolt then the scattering. there was no noise. i was kind of freaked out and did not know what to think. i had seen a few bright lights going acroos the sky that night, kinda thinking these were strange. i did not go out into the field for approx two weeks until after learning of the meteor showers we had on approx. the first week in december. my wife and i witnessed a flaming meteorite on halloween 2005,there were also lots of falling stars that night so i know the difference between the two and what i saw was not this. this was very strange. 
 
 the flash was only approx 50 yards away from me and approx 50 ���100 feet in the sky. i went out in the field probably the second week in dec. and found some strange looking rocks. all of them attract a magnet

i did bring one of them to the geology dept at univ. of de. the geologist seemed to think it was slag. . i went out in the field in october 2005. we had just cut the corn down and the soil had been turned. i went to the spot where the flash was and found a black shiny rock, approx 6 inches by 3 inches, weighs approx. 2 pds, very strong attraction to magnet. 

i am baffled at what i saw that night. i have been researching meteorites. i have looked at meteor wrongs. i did bring this rock to the geology dept at univ. of penn. they said that they believed it was a piece of glass not fully melted down, but they said it has garnet in it.They weren���t sure how garnet  would have gotten in there. they also said that meteors don���t have garnet in them. 

i sent the rock off to get it analyzed and sent it to a man at nasa. he stated he did not believe it to be a meteorite, according to the analysis. he did not identify it with any hematite or magnetite either. i am at a stopping point and do not know where to go. i was wondering if you would know where i can find out what this rock or whatever  is. i sent you the analysis if that would help and some pictures.

thank you for any assistance you can be for me.

ps having problem sending all pictures. if you would like to see them i will send them
content.summary: Bolt of energy came out of ground, to about fifty feet, huge energy ball then scattered

content.detailedDescription: I was heading toward sydney and was crossing the bridge at the bay side canteen when i saw a red light streaking across from the left...I thought it was a shooting star at first...It wasn't overly high in the sky, but the lighting in the area didn't permit me to get a better glimpse of the object creating the flash.  the object was going very quick and the light would flash on and off like a plane, but i was struck by the fact that it made no noise and travelled so quickly. i even turned off the radio to see if i could hear it - yet heard nothing.  i thought at the time it was a bit unusual to see a plane crossing to head to the airport at this location as i hadn't seen one cross there before, but i thought to myself there is a first for everything.  trees unfortunately obstructed most of my view but it appeared to go toward a wooded area further out and remained there for a few seconds.  i could see the red light in the distance, then next time i looked i could no longer see it - either because trees obstructed my view, it landed at the airport if it was in fact a plane or it moved on beyond my view. unfortunately i could not stop at the time.
content.summary: Red streaking light across the sky - flashing off/on like a plane but made no noise

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
The witness states that sometime in the month of july (exact date not recalled) 2000, he and his girlfriend, whom he subsequently married, were visiting gross point farms park.  they were sitting on lawn chairs and his girlfriend had her eyes closed.  it was mid afternoon and the sky was mostly clear with thin, scattered clouds.  
the witness looked up to see a formation of six slightly oblong objects moving rapidly within a cloud.  no wings were observed on any one of the objects. the formation was approximately sixty-five degrees from the horizon to the southwest of his position when he first spotted them.  he followed their movement and when the formation exited the cloud, there was ���nothing but blue sky���.  when the formation went into another cloud, he could again see the objects keeping the same pace through that cloud.  again, when they emerged from that cloud, they could not be seen.  there was no sound associated with the sighting. 
the formation moved at the same rapid pace (faster than any planes that the witness is aware of) from sw to the ne until he lost sight of them approximately twenty degrees above the ne horizon.
the witness states that the formation was about the size of a large pill (larger than an aspirin) held at arm���s length when it was directly above his head.  he did not say anything to his girlfriend at the time; consequently, he was the only witness.  although there were other people in the park at the time, he did not observe anyone else taking notice of the formation.
the total duration of the sighting was twelve to thirteen seconds.
the witness is presently thirty-two years old.  he was twenty-six at the time of the sighting.
the witness stated that he will make a drawing of the formation and send it to my po box to be included with this report.
content.summary: Formation of 6 objects traveled in straight path.  visible behind cloud – invisible with blue sky background.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south on route 385,from a relative's place,(there were 3 of us in the car), when we seen what we thought was a low flying plane. it was a bright white sphere, that had gold transitioning into the white, and then back to white again. there were no flashing beacons, and it was moving along pretty good in a south westerly direction, then it just stopped above the ridge, and hovered there. that's what caught our attention. we pulled over to the side of the road and you could hear a distant throb, like "whoom,whoom,whoom". judging from it's position in the sky we figured it would have to be pretty large. then we seen two aircraft coming towards the object, they had beacons, and one was coming from the east and one was coming from the west, we figured they must be chase planes, and then the object started moving south and zig zagged about 4 times before heading due south and up, it's size diminished and then it disappeared, one plane followed the light, and the other kept heading east, since it was still pretty well a full moon, we were able to see the vapor trail which meant that the chase planes would have been jets. the object left no vapor trail. we continued on home, hopefully we'll get to see this object again soon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mainly bright white, alternating to gold, and back to white

content.detailedDescription:
Looking west out my back window, i could see in the far distance a large bright red-orange cigar shaped flame or tail (appearing to be maybe two inches, a little thicker than a pencil)in the sky?  off a small object that i couldnt see that well. i saw a quick  flash, bright like maybe it exploded? but its direction never changed. or maybe a new stage to a rocket? i didnt know what to think? my son who brought it to my attention showed me how it come up from tree level and curved to travel south- south west in the sky.
i stood and watched it to see if anything else would happen till it went behind the trees and i couldnt see it anymore. the sun was just beginning to set, (it was still bright outside) so the clouds had the very beginning of the orange tint to them and the sky was starting to get a deeper blue purplish color. it wasnt traveling at any great speed, but faster than a normal airplane.  the weather was good, and visibility was good as well.  i dont know where it could have come up from originiating in that direction since its the gulf.  i have seen several oddities in the past that i could not explain, and have reported. i dont go looking for things to report, but instead look at things and see how one could think they were a ufo. i believe, yet i am a skeptic. anyway.. ? who can tell. i have read a few other reports that seems simular to what i reported today, but none from this area.  if this can be explained i would love to be contacted on it. thank you.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Diamond,  Fireball,  Star-like
content.summary: Large bright orange trail going across sky, looked like it exploded with a flash but continued on course.

content.detailedDescription:
I hope i am sending this to the right place. if not, can you please redirect me? on the 6th of oct at approx 9:00pm we noticed that the moon was clear and bright so we decided to take some pictures of it. we could not see anything strange with the naked eye but noticed something showing up in the images. we started to take the pics as fast as we could and tried to keep the same angle. we did, after getting a couple with the image, tried to re-locate the camera to see if it still showed. it did! the object was moving very fast as you can see and then it just went away (as the picture shows) and didnt come back. it moved around the moon and the halo of the moon but it also journied outside of that halo. so, my question to you is this...Can you tell me what the hell this is. i am not one to jump and claim i saw bigfoot or little green men but i cant reason this away. there was no flash used so its not a glare and the lense was clean. again, any clue what this may be?
thanks
brad golden
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Seem from port allegany looking toward smethport over bush hill area

many people reporting the sighting

have not seen it yet myself

three night in arow

roughly same time
content.summary: Light moving slowly across the horizon, stopping startin

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my deck to let me dog out to go to the bathroom about 8:35 pm on 10-6-06 and while waiting for him to go the bathroom in the yard, remained on my deck and looked up into the sky at the stars.  stars were easily seen although it wasn't pitch black yet.  i always look up at the stars when i am outside at night and look for planets, constellations, satellites, etc.  
i looked up and saw the easily identifiable lights of a commercial airliner as it headed west to east across the night sky.  it was easy to see this was an airliner as it had 2 white lights and then a quick red and green strobe and i see these all the time going across my house at night.  it was a perfecty calm night, no wind, no other sound going on and the airliner was high enough so i heard no sound at all.  as i tracked this airliner along its course i noticed an orange object about the size of a very bright star you would see on a very clear night.  it was traveling in a northeast direction and was about my hands distance from behind the plane with my arm fully extended to cover both the plane and the orange object.  the plane and the object were on two different paths.  
the first thing that got my attention was the orange color.  it was solid orange, did not pulse on and off nor did it change any other color. i see satellites all the time and all the ones i have ever seen look just like a faint white star and are traveling at a great speed and are across the sky in 30 seconds or less.  the object i saw was definitely orange as i could compare it to the typical bright white stars as it went by them.  the size of the object could be covered in its entirety by i would say the size of about a kernel of corn if it were held on my outstreched fingers.  i did not actually use anything other than my little finger to cover the object, but the kernel of corn size i feel would be accurate.  with the orange oject in view, i could still see the plane and could track the orange obects speed relative  to the planes speed and i would say that the object was the same speed to a bit slower than the planes.  i see satellites all the time and they are really moving across the sky fast and this was moving much slower than a satellite.  again since i look into the sky all the time during the day and night i know what satellites, planes, shooting stars, all look like and there relative speed.  my very first reaction was it was a satellite, but within a few seconds of observing this excluded it based on the orange color, the size, and the speed of it.
the object did not stop, nor change direction of any kind and continued to head in a northeastern direction.  what did seem strange is that the object seemed to always be the same size from when i first saw it to when it went out of sight.  planes, satellites, etc. that i always observe typically appear smaller the further they are away until just a dot, then gone.  this object seemed to remain the same size i would best guess about 5 times the size of a typical satellite that i usually see.  even when continued along its course i did not appreciate it getting smaller.  i basically just lost track of it after about 2 minutes.  i'm not sure exactly what the object was that i saw, but i know it was not a commercial plane, a satellite, a star, a planet. i went right inside my house and told my wife that i just saw somethng weird and described it to her.  i felt like i saw something that i have never seen before and could not put it into any category of anything i have seen before.
content.summary: Orange sphere goes across night sky slowly easy to see, non-pulsatile, linear path behind plane

content.detailedDescription: Standing with a friend observing a string of blue and red blinking light stationary in the sky looking northward towards seattle
content.summary: Long stationary string of blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice peaceful kite flight.I was flying my kite in a hay field and saw a round lens shaped object.At first it looked like a plane but then my heart sank.It looked like a real ufo! it was white and moving fast. first, it went behind a cloud for a few seconds and returned, but only slower. then it finnaly dissapeared behind a cloud. it was gone for a minute or so. then it came back for at least 3 minutes. then it was over.It had dissapeared behind a cloud. i felt weird, like i had just seen a person killed.
content.summary: I was flying my kite in a hay field and saw a round lens shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: I was called by a friend of mine who lives in the same apartment building a few floors higher than i.  she called and said she was looking at some "weird" disc shapes in the sky and they were appearing, becoming large, then disapprearing.  i ran upstairs and looked out the window over lake michigan and to my amazment there were these white-colored disks apprearing over the horizon and coming closer and then going back and disappearing.  there also seemed to be the twinkle of lights as the objects moved laterally.  at one point there were 15 or so objects in the sky.  these objects would appear and disappear.  as the sun rose over the horizon, one by one, the objects began to move back to the horizon like and disappeared.  this was the first time i have witnessed anything of the sort.  i was pretty shocked by what i saw!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Several disks over the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading home from work and had gone thru downtown antioch, il heading west on route 173 (near the il/wi border) at approx. 6:30 p.M. central time. i saw what at first appeared to be the vapor trail of a high flying jet. the object was aspirin size at arms length. at first i didn't pay that much attention because i thought it was the beginning of a vapor trail. the object was in clear view for several minutes. it seemed odd that it never "grew longer" as a normal vapor trail does. it also was a brighter white, appeared to be solid and teardrop shaped.

 as i was driving (the road begins to wind southwest/northwest and is tree lined) i noticed a second object that was exactly the same distance away as the first and again appeared as a teardrop shaped/vapor trail like object. i thought this was odd because this one was pointing northeast while the first object was pointing southwest. the second object was to the right of the other object and appeared out of nowhere. they appeared to be flying at the same altitude.

 as i continued westbound a few minutes later,(now 3 visible what appeared to be yet another identical shaped/sized object also pointing southwest) i noticed yet a third object, again the same size as the first two which appeared to be further west than the first object but not as far south. the third object put the 3 objects in an offset triangle formation.

 i was trying to go faster to get home to get my digital camera/camcorder, but the drivers in front of me were moving slowly in a no passing zone. i have no idea if anyone else saw these objects, but there were a few cars in front of me and a few behind me. 

 the sky was clear with no clouds and the sun was setting in the west, yet there was still plenty of daylight. then as if the objects knew i was trying to hurry home to photograph them they dissappeared at approximately 6:37 p.M.

 i know that a vapor trail from a jet doesn't just disappear within a few seconds, they dissipate over time. as i finally started to move faster and at a very far distance away, i saw one of the objects again near the horizon to the west and then lost it as i turned southbound onto wilmot road from route 173.

note: i did immediately draw a picture of what i saw, and can fax it in or scan it and email it later. please let me know where to send the fax or email.
content.summary: 3 teardrop shaped objects appeared/dissappeared within 7 minutes at high altitude, at first thought they were vapor trails, no clouds, daylight

content.detailedDescription: Tues morning at aprox 8am, going to work i noticed strange cloud formations to the east of ms gulf coast. it looked exactly like the pics i have seen of chemtrails, with multiple parallel lines and crossings with other strange looking clouds around. i have read the reports that claim that ufo activity is usually present with this, so i decided to start snapping pictures with my camphone. the quality is not great but it does seem to reveal objects-possibly spheres and discs. check it out. jc, what do you think? vk
content.summary: Photos of strange clouds reveal objects

content.detailedDescription: Son was outside jumping on old mattresses. he laid down on the mattress and saw a light flash on a tree above him. he looked up and saw what looked like a beam from a star that was above him. he ran inside and said we need to turn the lights off so the aliens can't see us and find us. dad said kitchen light had to be on, because he was cooking. son went to room to get toy weapons in case the aliens came down.
content.summary: Star shone down in beam, lit up tree in blue light

content.detailedDescription:
Two witnesses were in the back yard about 1am and one noticed a set of lights flying erratically.  when they both focused on it they described
the pair of lights as; quick and erratic, touched and overlapped each other, dogfighting, moving together swinging and zigzagging up the sky, the back one followed the other one more or less, like two balloons tied together, moved really fast, faded slowly and disappeared directly overhead.  they were watched moving from an east to west direction which is contrary to normal movement from that location.  one witness (color blind),claims to be a long time sky watcher and has never seen anything like this in the sky.  the other witness describes 2 pale blue or green lights.
content.summary: Two witnesses saw an anomalous set of lights flying erratically for about a minute before it disappeared overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was staying over at a freinds house, we lived at rockridge apartments near storrs connecticut and his house was i think at a place called mansfield - on the way to storrs from our place. i was about 8 years old (i am 46 now) and we were sleeping outside on his verandah in sleeping bags under a very clear and still starry night. my friend had fallen asleep and i was watching fireflies waiting for sleep to come when i noticed a hum or vibration - very light, hardly noticeable at all. i looked around and up and saw a round shape come into view over the trees - if you hold your hands out straight and make a circle thumb to thumb and index finger to index finger, that was the size of the 'thing'. at first i thought it was a helicopter because of it's very clear round shape which i thought may have been the shape created by rotor blades, but it was clearly silent and apparently close so it couldn't have been a helicopter.It had five lights around the front edge with the middle light being noticebly brighter than the two otheres either side of it. i studied it to try to figure out what it was, it took around 10 seconds to slowly and steadily travel from my right to my left where it then dissappeared over the trees. i decided that i had absolutely no idea what it was and nor do i to this day. i remember thinking at the time that no one is going to believe me, sure enough no one did at breakfast and neither did my parents when i got back home. the memory of that night has stayed with me ever since, very vivid and very real and very baffling.
content.summary: Silent, close, very visible, five lights.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were in batavia illinois lying on our backs on my friends pool deck staring up at the clear star lit sky noticeing how weird and unusual the only cloud in the sky looked.I have never seen a cloud like that before or since,and we all commented on how weird it looked.Then from out of the west first then the east,a total of six,three from each direction very bright balls of light entered the cloud but never exited.The four of us stayed up for about an hour,i think,watching and waiting for the objects that we thought for obvious reasons were ufo's, to come out of the clouds,but they never did.I was 12 years old then and it is a memory that is burned into my brain,and something i will never forget.The thing i can't understand is,when i asked my brother,cousin,and best friend about their account of that night,all of them said they had no memory of that knight.It was one of the highlites of my life,and i guess thats why i'm writing this.If someone can look back at the air traffic control records for the summer of 1973 over batavia illinois,that would be great.If you find something,let me know.If not,have a great day. sincerly,mark s
content.summary: Six bright objects witnessed by four people,fly into cloud,but don't fly out.Only one has memory of event.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed six very bright balls of an off white glowing light traveling on what appeared to be through cuchara valley on sunday october 1, 2006 after 11:00 p.M.. the balls of light traveled in a straight horizontal line, one right after another, barely above the mountains or foothills on the other side of the valley (i was at 9,100 feet). i was by a sliding glass door at the time and jumped up and opened the door and stepped out on the deck. at first i thought someone had turned on a string of white lights around the deck railing and part of the string had failed (that thought didn't last long). the objects didn't zoom by like a meteor, yet were faster than a speeding car. it was rather like a swift floating speed, not a flash. the event was over in the matter of a minute. the objects were baseball size. no sound what so ever was involved. they appeared to come from the cuchara pass area (or west of) and proceeded towards the town of la veta. the exact path of travel not known, i would guess southwest to northeast (sorry to be vague, not a local and unsure of the exact direction i was facing. one should not take my guess for fact). the next to the last ball appeared to have a tail. to be honest, i was so freaked out there could have been only five. i never expected to see something like that and was in no way prepared. my guess would be that it was some space trash re-entering from a low orbiting device we sent up, or weather ballons.
content.summary: Approximately six very bright white glowing round balls traveling in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: It was in the afternoon, after 1:00pm and i was sitting outside on my patio with my aunts who live next door. my aunts are seniors and we like to look up and notice the planes that go by. i just happened to look up and i noticed an all white circular object flying, not super fast, but faster then a few planes i have been noticing all week, above the clouds (with no smoke behind it), very high. the cloud itself was not a big cloud but it was a white cloud. i knew that it was not a plane, so i waited for it to come out of the other end of the cloud, but it never did. i stared at the cloud for at least five minutes, waiting for it to reappear, but it did not. my first reaction was amazement and " no f**ing way". like i said, i waited for it to show again but it did not. i did not lose sight of it, it just never came out from that one cloud.
content.summary: It was very high above the clouds,  white, circular and flying faster then any plane in the sky that day.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, october 1, 2006 at 11:17pm, mst, i was in my unlighted living room walking by a large picture window looking to the southwest at the nearly full moon low on the horizon in a position just north of the usaf academy along the front range. my home is at 7,220 feet altitude where i have a panoramic view to the south/southwest including the academy, pikes peak and colorado springs. i regularly observe commercial jets and high performance military aircraft at high and low altitudes as well as meteors, satellites, and some wild weather systems. having perhaps thousands of hours flightime in commercial and private aircraft, i think i am perhaps somewhat qualified to explain that i have seen something very unusual. however,in all fairness, i have been keeping my eyes open for 50 plus years to see what might be called an ufo, and here it is!

back to the sighting. at 11:17pm a flashing streak from the southwest just to the left of the dark side of the moon caught my undivided attention and it was immediately followed in perfect but segmented alignment by two more streaks in a flat laser-like trajectory all seeming to pulsate. the streaks were eastbound at high altitude well above any commercial traffic and travelling several times commercial jet speed i would estimate. maybe the "pulsating" visual could be attributed to some light and scattered cirrus clouds below the streaks.

my first reaction was that i was observing three consecutive air launched missiles and i thought of the peterson and/or schreiver bases in that direction. there was no sound or sonic boom. i considered turning to get a camera from my desk but didn't want to miss the observation. in 10-15 seconds, or thereabouts, it was all over. i sat by the window for 20 minutes more scanning the skies to no avail.
content.summary: Three in-line segmented pulsating streaks of light  eastbound at high altitude low on the horizon traveling at tremendous speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was going home from helping at jhon zink ranch and when my dad and i where driving down the hill i saw a siver blimp shape oblect it was fling to far abow to be a blimp but i only saw it for a few seconds.
content.summary: Sivery bimp shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I watch the sky and i saw falling star and she right abowe the horizont fly up to the sky again.
content.summary: Faling star??

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east to work on rt.137 buckly road north of libertyville illinois. it was about 7:00 am. there is a large decline in the road as it ramps down into the forrest preserve. as i came up to milwaukee road i saw this hugh cigar shapped ufo. i only saw the front and then the back as  it zipped by super fast heading north. as i got to the intersection of milwaukee avenue i looked north to see if i could see it again and it was gone. it was probibly in wisconsin by then concidering how fast it was going. i saw it plain as day. it was like looking at a hubcap on a car as it drives by. i filed a report with the libertyville police soon after. i recreated an image of what i saw that day. remember i first saw the front and then i saw the rear, just like a hubcap on a fast moving car. i felt like i saw something very strange. i think that the location on top of the hill where i saw this thing would be a great place to set up some high speed camera equipment.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo zipping over forrest preserve north of chicago.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Aug 2nd threw present day ! i have seen and recorded hours of video tape of ufos , wierd objects and even aliens ! i dont bull crap around ! this is all very true. it seems the aliens are trying to tell my things as well. alot of hidden messages etc. i have video taped on my owne more things than anyone ! the first encounter was aug 2nd i believe. it was 3.15 am on the second of aug. i was on my bike comming home from 7-11. i saw this close flashing lite. i waved at it telling it to follow me. i was kind of just jokeing. but i rode home very fast , ran in the house to get the cam corder. ran back out side. soon as i got out side with camera. the lite stopped over my house. it started strobe like lite or lite. very brite. it went down slowly until it was to low to see. but i kept filming. i saw my video tape when i went back in house. i paused tape , i studied tape. when i paused at certain frames i can see aliens on my porch and lawn. no lies no b.S. ! i feel very strong that this is all to real. i need very bad to share these videos with someone to look at it more close and with better machines to watch it with. sense that day aug 2nd , i have been recording these ufos , aliens and even rods. i kis you not. i feel you dont need to look any further. i have evrything on tape that anyone could ever want on this subject. im very very serius!
i know you get alot of b.S. from people. but i promise you this is all very very interesting and all true things. i have too much to even list. i hope you believe and trust me. this wont be a waist of your time at all!
i think people who b.S. and hoax are all fools. please contact me very soon. i dont know if the aliens did something to me or not. i had a couple of night mares. i want to know very bad. im very worried. i cant sleep at night. im afraid to sleep. i have been studying ufos for years so i know what im saying. please please contact me very soon. thank you .........Robert.P.S. im kind of new for this computer down loading stuff. visit youtube , and type in ufo fresno. i have 2 videos on there now. there not even my good ones either! i will be glad to send you some videos to.
